TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementEntityAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementEntityAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagementEntityAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: ManagementEntity 属性指示某个类提供通过 WMI 提供程序公开的管理信息。

span.span: The ManagementEntity attribute indicates that a class provides management information exposed through a WMI provider.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 库现在视为处于最终状态，且没有可用于会影响这些库的非安全性相关问题的进一步开发、增强或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不采用 name 参数。This constructor does not take a name parameter. 如果你不通过使用指定名称参数，关联的 WMI 类的名称将默认为特性化类的名称。If you do not specify a name by using the parameter, the name of the associated WMI class will default to the name of the attributed class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool External { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定此类是否表示在当前程序集外部实现的提供程序中的 WMI 类。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the class represents a WMI class in a provider implemented external to the current assembly.

value.span: 如果此类表示一个外部 WMI 类，则为布尔值 true；否则为 false。

span.span: A boolean value that is true if the class represents an external WMI class and false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它用于实现的提供程序实现用于扩展现有抽象的 WMI 类的类。This is used when implementing providers that implement classes that extend existing abstract WMI classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 WMI 类的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the WMI class.

value.span: 一个字符串，其中包含 WMI 类的名称。

span.span: A string that contains the name of the WMI class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你不通过设置此属性指定 WMI 类的名称，WMI 类将默认为特性化类的名称。If you do not specify the name of the WMI class by setting this property, the WMI class will default to the name of the attributed class. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，名称参数用于设置 MortgageCalcWMIProvider 类表示的 WMI 类的名称。In the following example, the Name parameter is used to set the name of the WMI class represented by the MortgageCalcWMIProvider class. 它到 MortgageCalculator 设置的名称。It sets the name to MortgageCalculator. 如果使用的参数不是名称，相应的 C# 类名，MortgageCalcWMIProvider 在这种情况下，用作 WMI 类名称。If the Name parameter is not used, the corresponding C# class name, MortgageCalcWMIProvider in this case, is used as the WMI class name. ``` [ManagementEntity(Name = "MortgageCalculator")] public class MortgageCalcWMIProvider { } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Singleton { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指定关联的类是否表示单一实例 WMI 类。

span.span: Specifies whether the associated class represents a singleton WMI class.

value.span: 如果此类表示单一实例 WMI 类，则为布尔值 true；否则为 false。

span.span: A boolean value that is true if the class represents a singleton WMI class and false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Singleton WMI 类是一个为其存在只能是单个实例。A singleton WMI class is one for which there can only ever be a single instance. 尽管无法通过编写代码以确保所创建单个实例的 WMI 类，但仍然提供此参数属性，以使任务轻松和一致。Although you could code the logic to ensure that only a single instance of a WMI class is ever created, this parameter attribute is provided to make the task easy and consistent. 当处理单一实例 WMI 类，客户端应用程序必须使用特殊语法。When working with singleton WMI classes, client applications must use special syntax. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Describing 在 MSDN 联机库中的实例对象路径主题[ http://www.msdn.com ](http://www.msdn.com/)。For more information, see the Describing an Instance Object Path topic in the MSDN online library at [http://www.msdn.com](http://www.msdn.com/). ## Examples 下面的代码段演示如何使用单一实例参数指明 C# 类对应于 WMI 类的单一实例。The following code snippet demonstrates how to use the Singleton parameter to indicate that a C# class corresponds to a singleton WMI class. ``` [ManagementEntity(Singleton=true)] public class SingletonSample ``` 有关实现 singleton 类的提供程序的完整的工作示例，请参阅[如何： 创建基本的分离的提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1dabd442-c1ff-40a1-bb0e-d7b3566c2300)。For a complete, working example of a provider that implements a singleton class, see [How to: Create a Basic Decoupled Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1dabd442-c1ff-40a1-bb0e-d7b3566c2300).
